content:
hi together
i have to define multiple valuesets binding to a CodeableConcept (i.e. Immunization.vaccineCode). in the IPS http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/StructureDefinition-Immunization-uv-ips.html#tabs-snap it is done via slicing, but i'am not sure if this is correct.

can somebody tell me what the correct way is to be able to do the binding to different valuesets?
Roeland Luykx has marked this topic as resolved.
